comments.body: Should we also document the other flags like `--experimental-json-modules` that were added here?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +122,126 @@.It Fl -entry-type Ns = Ns Ar type
Set the top-level module resolution type.
.
.It Fl -es-module-specifier-resolution
Select extension resolution algorithm for ES Modules; either 'explicit' (default) or 'node'

comments.body:
Sorry, still one nit (the period at the end hidden by the scrolling).
```suggestion
Select extension resolution algorithm for ES Modules; either 'explicit' (default) or 'node'.
```

diffHunk:

Select extension resolution algorithm for ES Modules; either 'explicit' (default) or 'node'
.
